item.description:
Ladies!

Have fun with your workout! Join us for Boot(y) Camp on December 1 at Kadanse! Feel free to come for 1, 2, or all 3! Please arrive a few minutes early and wear comfortable workout clothes and sneakers.  Our first Booty Camp this winter was lots of fun and we are hoping to top it!

11:15-11:30am: registration

11:30am - session 1: Burlesque in the Ballroom a unique workout, just for us girls...bring a tie, a towel, and be ready for fun

12:15pm - session 2: Booty, Belly, Barre a non-cardio, floor-based workout to sculpt ballerina legs without pressure on your joints

1pm - session 3: Burn the Floor with Balance; Master your gravity with Fitz!

**because topics covered in the third session apply to all, the fellas are welcome to join us at 1pm for class!

 

**$15 per session (45 min each), $40 for all 3. No partner needed. It’s all about you!

Feel free to contact me here or at the studio.

-Kelley

Kadanse

781-27-DANCE * info@kadanse.com * www.kadanse.com

group.name: The North Shore Ballroom Dancing Meetup Group

item.name: Booty Camp 2012 .... a dance & fitness day for the ladies! Part Quatre
